recipe.title: Roast Chicken Dinner
recipe.description: Classic Sunday roast with crispy skin and herb stuffing

on_enter.say: Right, let's preheat the oven to two hundred degrees celsius, which is about four hundred degrees fahrenheit. This will get us started on our lovely roast.

steps.descr: Stuff chicken with lemon, garlic, and herbs
steps.instructions: Stuff chicken with lemon, garlic, and herbs

on_enter.say: Now, let's stuff our chicken with those beautiful lemons, garlic, and fresh herbs. This will infuse the meat with incredible flavours.
Let's give the chicken a good rub with butter and season it generously. This will help create that lovely crispy skin we all love.

steps.descr: Roast for 1 hour 30 minutes, basting occasionally
steps.instructions: Roast for 1 hour 30 minutes, basting occasionally

on_enter.say: Time to pop the chicken into the oven. We'll roast it for one hour and thirty minutes, and don't forget to baste occasionally to keep it juicy.

steps.descr: Add vegetables to roasting pan after 30 minutes
steps.instructions: Add vegetables to roasting pan after 30 minutes

on_enter.say: After thirty minutes, let's add those lovely root vegetables to the roasting pan. They'll soak up all the delicious juices.
Brilliant! Let's let the chicken rest for fifteen minutes before carving. This is crucial to keep all those lovely juices inside.
Finally, let's make a gorgeous gravy from the pan juices. This will be the perfect finishing touch to our roast dinner.

notes.text:
Let chicken come to room temperature first
Use a meat thermometer - should reach seventy-five degrees celsius
Save the carcass for stock
